医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
报告显示安大略省庇护所中阿片类药物过量致死率上升圣迈克尔医院安大略省药物政策研究网络 (ODPRN) 和安大略省公共卫生局的研究人员分析了安大略省首席验尸官办公室和 ICES 的健康数据，发现庇护所内有 210 例因阿片类药物中毒而意外死亡。 2018 年 1 月至 2022 年 5 月，研究期间死亡人数增加了两倍多（大流行前为 48 人，大流行期间为 162 人）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Report-reveals-rising-rates-of-fatal-opioid-overdoses-in-Ontario-shelters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Report-reveals-rising-rates-of-fatal-opioid-overdoses-in-Ontario-shelters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2d684d9-c355-424c-bc89-b6a7e7f613be Tue, 18 Jun 2024 10:06:50 -0400 Report reveals rising rates of fatal opioid overdoses in Ontario shelters
现有的癌症药物有望阻止帕金森氏症小鼠中的α-突触核蛋白扩散在对基因工程小鼠进行的研究中，约翰·霍普金斯大学医学院的研究人员表示，他们已经发现了一个涉及 Aplp1 的潜在新生物靶点，Alpp1 是一种细胞表面蛋白，可驱动帕金森病致病的 α-突触核蛋白的传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Existing-cancer-drug-shows-promise-in-blocking-alpha-synuclein-spread-in-Parkinsons-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Existing-cancer-drug-shows-promise-in-blocking-alpha-synuclein-spread-in-Parkinsons-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fcfcda5b-274f-4a91-a55b-0697fa055163 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 10:01:50 -0400 Existing cancer drug shows promise in blocking alpha-synuclein spread in Parkinson's mice
为使用 Ozempic 等最新抗肥胖药物的患者提供新的饮食建议研究人员为服用抗肥胖药物 (AOM) 的患者的营养评估、治疗和监测提供循证建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/New-dietary-recommendations-for-病人-on-latest-anti-obesity-medications-like-Ozempic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/New-dietary-recommendations-for-病人-on-latest-anti-obesity-medications-like-Ozempic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=347be44c-11d4-4586-9364-e1e4b562ddb9 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 09:22:00 -0400 New dietary recommendations for patients on latest anti-obesity medications like Ozempic
研究发现男性比女性更常吃肉，尤其是在性别平等的发达国家研究人员研究了与性别相关的差异是否普遍存在，是否受到文化规范的影响，是否与表达某些行为的机会有关，以及在发展程度较高和性别不平等程度较小的国家中是否较弱或较强。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Study-finds-men-eat-meat-more-often-than-women-special-in-gender-equal-development-countries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Study-finds-men-eat-meat-more-often-than-women-special-in-gender-equal-development-countries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7043fd3-7004-455e-bc6a-864abc510f71 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 08:43:00 -0400 Study finds men eat meat more often than women, especially in gender-equal, developed countries
癌症幸存者患心血管疾病和其他癌症的风险更大瑞典研究人员对自 1958 年以来所有 25 岁以下患有癌症的人进行了调查。这项由林雪平大学和东约特兰地区的研究人员领导的研究表明，癌症幸存者在以后的时间里患心血管疾病、其他癌症和其他诊断的风险更大。生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Cancer-survivors-are-at-greater-risk-for-cardioangio-diseases-other-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Cancer-survivors-are-at-greater-risk-for-cardioangio-diseases-other-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17c6ecdd-3384-48be-9d3f-74620a17f489 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 08:09:48 -0400 Cancer survivors are at greater risk for cardiovascular diseases, other cancers
年长女性与年长男性不同。不幸的是，他们的健康状况却没有得到充分的研究。几十年来，医学研究一直在欺骗女性。对于老年女性来说尤其如此，这使得医生无法了解如何最好地管理她们的健康的极其重要的信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Older-women-are- Different-than-older-men-Their-health-is-woeously-understudied.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Older-women-are- Different-than-older-men-Their-health-is-woeously-understudied.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e441a5a-c206-46ff-bb00-5b0a02ed6efc Tue, 18 Jun 2024 07:12:46 -0400 Older women are different than older men. Their health is woefully understudied.

COVID-19 疫苗可减少孕妇的感染和并发症2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 疫苗的反应原性和对妊娠结局的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/COVID-19-vaccines-reduce-infection-and-complications-in-pregnant-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/COVID-19-vaccines-reduce-infection-and-complications-in-pregnant-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9da5ed3-cee4-473f-ad68-de623be22312 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 04:10:00 -0400 COVID-19 vaccines reduce infection and complications in pregnant women
开放获取图谱揭示了蛔虫衰老的分子机制一份新的衰老图谱让科学家们能够深入了解线虫中的单个细胞和组织如何衰老，以及不同的寿命延长策略如何使时钟停止。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Open-access-atlas-unveils-the-molecular-mechanisms-of-roundworm-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Open-access-atlas-unveils-the-molecular-mechanisms-of-roundworm-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=521865b2-52b3-4b37-8f18-276db7dbd77b Tue, 18 Jun 2024 02:17:27 -0400 Open-access atlas unveils the molecular mechanisms of roundworm aging
